languages.text:
При повышении уровня вместо обычных способностей и талантов псайкер может также изучать новые психосилы и псайкерские таланты.
Таланты и психосилы разделяются по дисциплинам — пока у псайкера не изучена хотя бы одна психосила из соответствующей дисциплины, он не может приобрести талант из этой же дисциплины. Для приобретения психосил высокого уровня псайкеру необходимо иметь хотя бы одну психосилу из этой дисциплины на уровень ниже, а также высокий пси-рейтинг. Повышение пси-рейтинга можно выбрать при повышении уровня вместо талантов.

traits.locale_text:
При повышении уровня вместо обычных способностей и талантов псайкер может также изучать новые психосилы и псайкерские таланты.
Таланты и психосилы разделяются по дисциплинам — пока у псайкера не изучена хотя бы одна психосила из соответствующей дисциплины, он не может приобрести талант из этой же дисциплины. Для приобретения психосил высокого уровня псайкеру необходимо иметь хотя бы одну психосилу из этой дисциплины на уровень ниже, а также высокий пси-рейтинг. Повышение пси-рейтинга можно выбрать при повышении уровня вместо талантов.

languages.text:
When a psyker reaches a new level, they can choose to learn new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} instead of archetype {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and talents.
Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.
languages.original_text:
При повышении уровня вместо обычных способностей и талантов псайкер может также изучать новые психосилы и псайкерские таланты.
Таланты и психосилы разделяются по дисциплинам — пока у псайкера не изучена хотя бы одна психосила из соответствующей дисциплины, он не может приобрести талант из этой же дисциплины. Для приобретения психосил высокого уровня псайкеру необходимо иметь хотя бы одну психосилу из этой дисциплины на уровень ниже, а также высокий пси-рейтинг. Повышение пси-рейтинга можно выбрать при повышении уровня вместо талантов.

traits.locale_text:
When a psyker reaches a new level, they can choose to learn new psychic powers and psyker talents instead of doctrine abilities and talents.
Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high psy rating. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.

When a psyker reaches a new level, they can choose to learn new psychic powers and psyker talents instead of doctrine abilities and talents.
Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high psy rating. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.

A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.

Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.

When a psyker reaches a new level, they can choose to learn new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} instead of archetype {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and talents.
Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.

languages.text:
当灵能者升级时，可以不选择任何职业相关的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或天赋，而是选择学习新的灵能{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}能力{/g}，或解锁新的灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}。
灵能天赋与灵能天赋与灵能者的学派息息相关。灵能者只有学习某种学派的至少一个灵能能力之后，才能学习该学派的灵能天赋。若要学习级别更高的灵能能力，灵能者需要先学习级别较低的灵能能力，切灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}必须满足条件。当灵能者解锁新天赋时，可以不选择任何天赋，而是提高灵能等级。
languages.original_text:
When a psyker reaches a new level, they can choose to learn new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} instead of archetype {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and talents.
Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.

traits.locale_text:
当灵能者升级时，可以不选择任何信条相关的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或天赋，而是选择学习新的灵能{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}能力{/g}，或解锁新的灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}。
灵能天赋与灵能天赋与灵能者的学派息息相关。灵能者只有学习某种学派的至少一个灵能能力之后，才能学习该学派的灵能天赋。若要学习级别更高的灵能能力，灵能者需要先学习级别较低的灵能能力，切灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}必须满足条件。当灵能者解锁新天赋时，可以不选择任何天赋，而是提高灵能等级。

languages.text:
異能者がレベルアップすると、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}タイプや才能の代わりに、新たな{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}サイキック・パワー{/g}や異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}才能{/g}の獲得が選択できる。
サイキック・パワーと才能は、サイキック体系に基づいて分類される。異能者は、サイキック体系から少なくとも1つのサイキック・パワーを習得するまで、同サイキック体系の才能を習得することはできない。より高レベルのサイキック・パワーを習得するには、異能者はまず同じサイキック体系の低いレベルのサイキック・パワーを習得しなければならない。さらに、十分高い{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}を有する必要がある。異能者は新たな才能を選ぶ代わりに、超能力レートを増やすことができる。
languages.original_text:
When a psyker reaches a new level, they can choose to learn new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} instead of archetype {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and talents.
Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.

traits.locale_text:
異能者が新たなレベルに到達すると、ドクトリン{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}や才能の代わりに、新たな{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}や異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}才能{/g}を覚えるよう選択できる。
超能力と才能は、サイキック体系に基づいて分類される。異能者は、サイキック体系から少なくとも1つの超能力を覚えるまで、そのサイキック体系の才能を習得することはできない。より上位の異能者パワーを習得するには、異能者はまず同じサイキック体系の低いレベルの異能者パワーを覚えなければならない。さらに、十分高い{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}を有する必要がある。異能者は新たな才能を選ぶ代わりに、超能力レートを増やすことができる。

languages.text:
Cuando un psíquico alcanza un nivel nuevo, puede decidir entre aprender {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} psíquicos nuevos en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y talentos de arquetipo.
Los poderes y talentos psíquicos se categorizan según la disciplina. Un psíquico debe aprender al menos un poder psíquico de una disciplina para obtener talentos de la misma. Para que un psíquico aprende poderes psíquicos de nivel superior, tiene que aprender al menos un poder psíquico de un nivel inferior de la misma disciplina y su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} debe ser lo suficientemente alto. Un psíquico puede aumentar su factor psíquico en vez de escoger un nuevo talento.
languages.original_text:
When a psyker reaches a new level, they can choose to learn new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} instead of archetype {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and talents.
Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando un psíquico alcanza un nivel nuevo, puede decidir entre aprender {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} psíquicos nuevos en vez de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} y talentos de doctrina.
Los poderes y talentos psíquicos se categorizan según la disciplina. Un psíquico debe aprender al menos un poder psíquico de una disciplina para obtener talentos de la misma. Para que un psíquico aprende poderes psíquicos de nivel superior, tiene que aprender al menos un poder psíquico de un nivel inferior de la misma disciplina y su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} debe ser lo suficientemente alto. Un psíquico puede aumentar su factor psíquico en vez de escoger un nuevo talento.

languages.text: Wenn ein Psioniker eine neue Stufe erreicht, kann er sich entscheiden, neue {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g} und Psioniker-{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} anstatt Archetyp-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und -Talente zu erlernen. Psionische Kräfte und Talente werden nach Disziplinen kategorisiert. Solange ein Psioniker nicht mindestens eine psionische Kraft aus einer Disziplin erlernt hat, kann er keine Talente aus dieser Disziplin erwerben. Um höhere Psioniker-Kräfte zu erlernen, muss ein Psioniker zuerst mindestens eine psionische Kraft aus derselben Disziplin erlernen, die eine Stufe niedriger ist, und er muss außerdem einen ausreichend hohen {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} haben. Ein Psioniker kann seinen Psi-Wert erhöhen, anstatt ein neues Talent zu wählen.
languages.original_text:
When a psyker reaches a new level, they can choose to learn new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} instead of archetype {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and talents.
Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn ein Psioniker eine neue Stufe erreicht, kann er sich entscheiden, neue {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g} und Psioniker-{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} anstatt Doktrin-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und -Talente zu erlernen.
Psionische Kräfte und Talente werden nach Disziplinen kategorisiert. Solange ein Psioniker nicht mindestens eine psionische Kraft aus einer Disziplin erlernt hat, kann er keine Talente aus dieser Disziplin erwerben. Um höhere Psioniker-Kräfte zu erlernen, muss ein Psioniker zuerst mindestens eine psionische Kraft aus derselben Disziplin erlernen, die eine Stufe niedriger ist, und er muss außerdem einen ausreichend hohen {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} haben. Ein Psioniker kann seinen Psi-Wert erhöhen, anstatt ein neues Talent zu wählen.

languages.text:
Lorsqu'un psyker atteint un nouveau niveau, il peut choisir d'apprendre de nouveaux {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} de psyker au lieu des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et talents de son archétype.
Les pouvoirs psychiques et les talents sont classés en fonction des disciplines. Tant qu'un psyker n'a pas appris au moins un pouvoir psychique dans une discipline, il ne peut pas acquérir de talents dans cette discipline. Pour apprendre des pouvoirs psychiques de plus haut niveau, un psyker doit d'abord apprendre au moins un pouvoir psychique de niveau inférieur dans la même discipline, et doit disposer d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} suffisamment élevé. Un psyker peut augmenter son indice psy plutôt que de choisir un nouveau talent.
languages.original_text:
When a psyker reaches a new level, they can choose to learn new {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} and psyker {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} instead of archetype {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and talents.
Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsqu'un psyker atteint un nouveau niveau, il peut choisir d'apprendre de nouveaux {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} de psyker au lieu des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et talents de la doctrine.
Les pouvoirs psychiques et les talents sont classés en fonction des disciplines. Tant qu'un psyker n'a pas appris au moins un pouvoir psychique dans une discipline, il ne peut pas acquérir de talents dans cette discipline. Pour apprendre des pouvoirs psychiques de plus haut niveau, un psyker doit d'abord apprendre au moins un pouvoir psychique de niveau inférieur dans la même discipline, et il doit également disposer d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} suffisamment élevé. Un psyker peut augmenter son indice psy plutôt que de choisir un nouveau talent.

languages.text:
Bir ruhsezer yeni bir seviyeye ulaştığında, arketip {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve becerileri yerine yeni {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}ruhsezi güçleri{/g} ve ruhsezer {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerileri{/g} öğrenmeyi seçebilir.
Ruhsezi güçleri ve becerileri, disiplinlere göre sınıflandırılır. Bir ruhsezer bir disiplinden en az bir ruhsezi gücü öğrenene kadar, o disiplinden beceriler edinemez. Bir ruhsezerin daha yüksek seviye ruhsezer güçleri öğrenebilmesi için, öncelikle aynı disiplinden bir seviye daha düşük en az bir ruhsezi gücü öğrenmesi şarttır ve ayrıca yeterince yüksek {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesine{/g} de sahip olması gerekir. Bir ruhsezer, yeni bir beceri seçmek yerine ruhsezi derecesini artırabilir.
languages.original_text:

Psychic powers and talents are categorised based on disciplines. Until a psyker learns at least one psychic power from a discipline, they cannot acquire talents from that discipline. To learn higher level psyker powers, a psyker must first learn at least one psychic power that is one level lower from the same discipline, and they also must have a sufficiently high {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. A psyker can increase their psy rating instead of choosing a new talent.
